pages.text: Just a decorative block to support Convoyor Belt for example.$(br) Also you can right click with an iron or glass $(l:bedrockutils:misc/itemplate_entry)plate$() to make Covered or Windowed WalkAway Slab.$(br) Sneak + Right click with an $(l:bedrockutils:tools/hammerplate_entry)Hammer Plate$() to remove.$(br) Right click with Hammer Plate to move down or up Framed or Covered WalkAway.
